item.title: Data Science Bootcamp
item.description: About the Course If you are completely new to Data Science, this well recognized course is the best place to start.

item.title: Business Intelligence and Information Design : Introduction : BIID101
item.description: About the Course There are four functional roles in Data Science, namely, Business Analyst, Data Analyst, Machine Learning Engineer and Data Engineer.

item.description: About the Course There are four functional roles in Data Science, namely, Business Analyst, Data Analyst, Machine Learning Engineer and Data Engineer.

item.description: About the Course There are four functional roles in Data Science, namely, Business Analyst, Data Analyst, Machine Learning Engineer and Data Engineer.

item.title: Data Analysis : Introduction : DA101
item.description: About the Course The problem is not Big Data. The problem is Small Data.

item.title: Data Analysis : Advance : DA301
item.description: About the Course In May 1968, the U.S. Navy’s nuclear submarine USS Scorpion failed to arrive as expected at her home port of Norfolk, Virginia.
